title: Interest check for community tournaments?
body:
Hey guys, just an interest check for us hosting community tournaments for you guys. Post below with what types of tournaments you'd like to see hosted (Howling Abyss draft pick, ARAM, 1v1, Twisted Treeline or even Summoner's Rift, any other suggestions?)

There'll be a poll below to gauge what time/days people are most likely to be available to help us better organise these events, please select the timeslot you're most likely to be available during.
